name: Car Drive Long Road Trip Game
name_original: Car Drive Long Road Trip Game
description:
Are you crazy for adventures, can you survive in hot desert with your car and everything that a desert have?
The long drive road trip is all about a long road trip with desert animal hunting and off-road outlaws.the long road trip car driving simulator game starts with your car in garage, you take your car and repair an restore the car.
There are different realistic environments hot desert environment and mountain environment driving.
This is the off-road mountain driving game as well as off-road mudness driving car.you have to take care of gasoline and look around for the gas stations to fill the gas, you have to take care of car engine as this is also a car fixing games you can do your journey smoothly without being haunted by animals.and you don’t need to go to wrong turn on the road because of gasoline or other car engine problem.
You will have to do quests in between your journey and if you are hungry you can hunt for food.your American muscle car is best for off-road car driving games, and animal hunting games, so get challenge of road trip the long drive car game and junkyard simulator.also its car mechanic junkyard simulator as you have to repair your car in junkyard.
There are abandoned shops and stay areas you can find something there for life saving,you have to be very careful and take your shotgun with you so you can do your journey very safely, and become a road warrior in this car driving game in desert.its not a car racing game its long drive survival game.
Road trip game is a big chance to explore new places and get survival experience.
